column3: Latest;A Dutch man suddenly fell off his seat in a restaurant in the center of Battambang City and died.------The incident took place at 3 pm on November 29
column4: 2019 at “Flavors of India” restaurant in Group 05
column7: Battambang.------Authorities of the technical and forensic offices as well as the medical staff of the provincial health department visited the scene. The victim was identified as  FRANCISCUS CHRISTIANUS VAN KRUINING
column11: the competent authorities and medical team concluded that the man had died of a stroke. ------KAMPUCHEATHMEY
